column4: Why is my Cd-RW/Dvd-rom drive listing a dvd as a cd-rom? It also can't open it, I installed the css decoder package. :/
I don't know how to do that.
do u have an usb flashdisk?
i am having a problem with removable media too
but it didn't work in Hoary either
i've been searching for a solution all day
I'm probably just going to load window home on this laptop, the wireless and dvd play are too much trouble.
I'm going to start saving up for a System 76 laptop. (ubuntu installed)
wireless shouldn't be hard under dapper
